titles.title: Finding that the Russian Federation's presence in the United Nations Security Council violates the purposes and principles of the United Nations.
Finding that the Russian Federation's presence in the United Nations Security Council violates the purposes and principles of the United Nations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary: This resolution urges the President to take actions to limit, suspend, or terminate Russia's participation in the organs and specialized agencies of the United Nations (U.N.), including the U.N. Security Council.
